1. Town of Highland Park

1. Highland Park, Texas 75205

   Town Hall:
   Mon. - Fri. - 7:30 AM - 4:30 PM

   Police/Fire/EMS Emergency & Non-Emergency Services:
   24 hours a day, 7 days a week

1. Phone:
   [214-521-4161](tel:2145214161)
